steps.name: I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Campaigns" from home page
All Flights loads which I have access to
I search/filter for a particular result
Click on Apply button

elements.name: 01 Add new icons on left hand tool bar, icon on each flight and tooltip

steps.name: All Flights matching search/filter combination load as results
Creatives option shown on the Campaigns tab
There is an icons for Creatives
Tooltips shown on mouseover on each Creatives icon
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns
I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser
Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"
The main homepage loads successfully
I click on "Campaigns" from home page
All Flights loads which I have access to
I search/filter for a particular result
Click on Apply button

elements.name: 02 Able to open creatives tab from flights

steps.name: All Flights matching search/filter combination load as results
Creatives option shown on the Campaigns tab
I click on the creatives icon on flight row
Creatives screen opened
Creatives are listed for the Advertiser Account of the Flight selected
Flights Advertiser Account is automatically applied on the Advertiser Account Name
Change button shown on the creative page
I am a Proteus User

The main homepage loads successfully

elements.name: 03 Able to change the Advertiser Account on Creatives screen

steps.name: I click on the creatives icon on flight row
Creatives screen opened
Click on Change button
Option to change advertiser account exist
I change the advertiser and save
New advertiser details shown on the creatives page
I am a Proteus User
I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns

The main homepage loads successfully

I click on the creatives icon on flight row
Creatives screen opened
There is a tag icon on the right hand side of the creative row
Tooltips shown on mouseover on tag icon 'View creative tag and image'
Click on the tag icon
Pop up shown with the creative name and options
Able to copy the creative tag script
Unable to edit the creative tag script

steps.name: Creatives bulk edit button shown on Creatives tab
Tooltips shown on mouseover on Creative Bulk edit button

Creatives grid changed to editable state
Save button shown and is disabled
Cancel button shown and is enabled
Editable columns shown on Creatives grid
ReadOnly columns shown on Creatives grid
